recipe_name: Healthy Fish Tacos with Mango Salsa
ingredients: 1  mango - peeled, seeded, and chopped, 2  avocados - peeled, pitted, and chopped, 1 cup chopped tomato,   +   1/2 cup diced red onion,   +   1/2 cup diced red pepper, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1  lime, juiced, 1 teaspoon cider vinegar, 1 dash hot pepper sauce, or to taste,   salt and ground black pepper to taste, 8  taco shells, 4 (6 ounce) mahi mahi fillets, cut into 1-inch slices, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon paprika,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 3g 13%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 290mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 24g 9%, Dietary Fiber 6g 20%, Total Sugars 8g, Protein 19g, Vitamin C 30mg 152%, Calcium 50mg 4%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 778mg 17%
